flawed_nl_solution:
Mary spent 100/4= <<100/4=25>>25 dollars on a new video game.
So, after the video game purchase, Mary was left with 100 - 25 = <<100-25=70>>70 dollars.
Mary then bought swimming goggles for 70/5 = <<70/5=14>>14 dollars
Mary had 70 - 14 = <<70-14=56>>56 dollars left
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 70. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
